content:
<rule id="spring-components-00002" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <!-- Spring version 6.0.0 is Jakarta compliant -->
            <when>
                <or>
                    <dependency artifactId="{*}" groupId="org.springframework" toVersion="5.99.999"/>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="{*}" groupId="org.springframework" toVersion="5.99.999"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="Version of Spring not compatible with Jakarta EE 9+">
                    <message>Version 6.0.0 is the minimum version of Spring that is Jakarta EE 9+ compatible</message>
                    <link href="https://spring.io/blog/2021/09/02/a-java-17-and-jakarta-ee-9-baseline-for-spring-framework-6/" title="A Java 17 and Jakarta EE 9 baseline for Spring Framework 6"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
